org.openbel.framework.common.cfg
Class SystemConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  org.openbel.framework.common.cfg.Configuration
      org.openbel.framework.common.cfg.SystemConfiguration

public final class SystemConfiguration
extends Configuration

Provides system configuration capabilities.

Two types of configuration exist within the BEL framework, system configuration and runtime configuration. System configuration allows access and modification of settings that affect the system's behavior, i.e., the installation of the BEL framework.

createSystemConfiguration

public static SystemConfiguration createSystemConfiguration(File file)
                                                     throws IOException
Creates the system configuration from the provided file, which may be null.

Parameters:
file - System configuration file, which may be null
Returns:
SystemConfiguration
Throws:
IOException - Thrown if an I/O error occurs

getSystemConfiguration

public static SystemConfiguration getSystemConfiguration()
Returns the system configuration.

It is an error to access the system configuration before it has been created. As a result, this method throws IllegalStateException to indicate this has occurred.

Returns:
SystemConfiguration
Throws:
IllegalStateException - Thrown if no system configuration has been created
See Also:
createSystemConfiguration(File)

destroySystemConfiguration

protected static void destroySystemConfiguration()
Destroys the system configuration.

It is an error to destroy the system configuration before it has been created. As a result, this method throws IllegalStateException to indicate this has occurred.

See Also:
createSystemConfiguration(File)
